title: Beau Ryan admits his wife Kara had 'concerns' about him traveling alone for six weeks
text:
He was recently named the new host of Australia's rebooted reality show The Amazing Race.

But Beau Ryan, who was famously embroiled in a cheating scandal with Hi-5 star Lauren Brant in 2015, has admitted his wife Kara had reservations about him taking on the jet-setting gig.

Speaking to The Daily Telegraph on Sunday, Beau described his six-week stint filming The Amazing Race away from his family, admitting: 'Looking back at it now, [Kara] probably had reasons and anyone would have concerns when I was away for that long.'

'We've had our ups and downs': Beau Ryan, 34, has admitted his wife Kara (pictured) had 'concerns' about him traveling alone for six weeks to film The Amazing Race- four years after his cheating scandal with Hi-5 star Lauren Brant

'But if it was a test, we passed,' the TV larrikin added, confirming that the couple are stronger than ever.

Reflecting on the infamous 2015 scandal's affect on his marriage, Beau told the publication: 'We've been to hell and back, as you know, but I've grown a lot as a person'

Beau and former Hi-5 star Lauren were accused by Brant's partner at the time, Warren Riley, of having an affair when they met on Aladdin and his Wondrous Lamp stage production in 2015.

New gig: Beau is hosting the reboot of The Amazing Race Australia

The alleged affair came one year after he retired from NRL following an ongoing neck injury.

In March 2016, Kara explained to Woman's Day magazine that when the news broke, amid all the drama, she was more worried about her man, 30, than herself.

'I was actually more worried for Beau, if I'm honest,' she said.

Accused: Beau and former Hi-5 star Lauren Brant (pictured) were accused of having an affair by Brant's partner at the time Warren Riley of having an affair when they met on Aladdin and his Wondrous Lamp stage production in 2015

Saying he was still a good man and a good father to their three-year-old daughter Remi, she explained: 'The grass isn't always greener, and while it was a difficult situation, running from anything in life is never the answer.'

The beauty added the media glare was tough to go through for them both.

'I'm probably emotionally stronger than Beau, and I could see how upset he was, so I was more concerned for him and our family.'
